start: 🤖 Track your TON validator status â€” Telemetry, Fines, Urgent Alerts, and more. Add your first node and choose notifications youâ€™d like to receive.

wrong_adnl: The input doesn't seem to be a valid ADNL address.
node_already_exists: Node with this ADNL address already exists.
node_added: Node added successfully. Send label for the node or skip.
node_telemetry_not_send: Note: this node does not send telemetry data so you won't receive TelemetryAlert notifications. To enable telemetry on node type set sendTelemetry true in MyTonCtrl console.
wrong_label: The label should be 1-32 characters long.
node_label_added: Great! Now you can go to the Notifications section and configure notifications.
main_menu: This bot will help you to track your TON nodes status: Telemetry, Fines, Urgent Alerts and more. 💡 Subscribe to TON Status channel to stay updated and receive urgent announcements.
my_nodes: This section lists all the nodes youâ€™ve added. Select any of them to configure notifications.
